EmailTemplate.subject: Products of the Month
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Products of the Month
Univar USA is pleased to offer the following “Product(s) of the Month” at a discounted price. Quantities are limited and available on a first-come/first-served basis, so act quickly! Offer good until November 30, 2009 or current inventories are depleted.
Products:
Product 1 Product 2 Product 3
Take advantage by calling the number for your nearest Univar location to place your order.
Univar Locations: http://www.univarusa.com/pagesi/distributionnetwork?OpenForm
We look forward to hearing from you soon.
All transactions are subject to Univar's Standard Terms & Conditions. Univar rejects all other terms and conditions unless otherwise agreed upon in writing by an authorized Univar representative.
Standard Terms and Conditions: http://www.univarusa.com/salesterms.htm
